doc.title: The Olive Sisters
doc.plot: When single Adrienne Bennett loses her successful marketing firm, as well as all the trappings of weatlh, she is forced to retreat to her one remaining asset: a run down olive farm in rural Australia that she inherited from her estranged father. An intimate epic that simultaneously tells two passionate love stories set 50 years apart. The Olive Sisters is a moving yet amusing saga of empowerment and self discovery.
